WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I tried the PieChart and RadialGaugeChart.

the PieChart does not render values below 0 correctly. Another Pie shows up in some weird way.

the RadialGaugeChart will show values above 100% as not having reached 100% (leaving some arbitrary blank space).

regards, Tilli
WorkItem.Summary: negative or values larger than 100% are not rendered correctly
